tasks.title: Merge & deploy PR #18 — Performance & SEO fixes
nathanSteps: git pull origin main && git push heroku main
tasks.notes: Fixes LCP from 28s to ~3-5s (pagination), adds meta descriptions, OG tags, cache headers, lang attr. Based on PageSpeed Insights report.

tasks.title: Create Washington DC Place page
tasks.notes: Place created with SEO content. Shows 3/11 buildings linked — remaining DC buildings may need association via admin. Coordinates: 38.9072, -77.0369.

tasks.title: Hetzner API token for dashboard
tasks.blockedReason: Nathan needs to enter Hetzner credentials in the dashboard ⚙️
nathanSteps: Go to https://console.hetzner.cloud → Security → API Tokens
Find server ID in Hetzner Console URL
Open Atlas dashboard → ⚙️ → paste token + server ID → Save
tasks.notes: Low priority — nice to have for emergency restarts from dashboard.

tasks.notes: Existing cron handles 4x daily posting. Need to queue pins for all cities. Can prepare pin data (title, description, URL, board) in memory/pinterest-pins.json for the cron to consume.
